18.0 WAIVER OF JURY TRIAL AND PUNITIVE DAMAGES

18.1 IF EITHER PARTY INITIATES LITIGATION INVOLVING THIS AGREEMENT OR ANY ASPECT OF THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES (EVEN IF OTHER PARTIES OR OTHER CLAIMS ARE INCLUDED IN SUCH LITIGATION), ALL THE PARTIES WAIVE THEIR RIGHT TO A TRIAL BY JURY.

18.2 IN ANY DISPUTE BETWEEN THE PARTIES, ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT, ANY BREACH OF THIS AGREEMENT, OR THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES, WHETHER SOUNDING IN CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ALL PARTIES WAIVE ANY RIGHT THEY. MAY HAVE TO PUNITIVE OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES FROM THE OTHER.
perturbation.changed_text:
17.10 Economic Conditions Not a Defense. Neither general economic downturn or conditions nor your own financial inability to perform the terms of this Agreement will be a defense to an action by us or one of the Entities for your breach of this Agreement.

18.1 IF EITHER PARTY INITIATES LITIGATION INVOLVING THIS AGREEMENT OR ANY ASPECT OF THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES (EVEN IF OTHER PARTIES OR OTHER CLAIMS ARE INCLUDED IN SUCH LITIGATION), ALL THE PARTIES MAY OR MAY NOT WAIVE THEIR RIGHT TO A TRIAL BY JURY. ALL THE PARTIES ARE ENCOURAGED TO NEGOTIATE IF THIS SITUATION OCCURS.

18.2 IN ANY DISPUTE BETWEEN THE PARTIES, ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT, ANY BREACH OF THIS AGREEMENT, OR THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES, WHETHER SOUNDING IN CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ALL PARTIES AGREE NOT TO SEEK PUNITIVE OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES FROM THE OTHER, BUT PARTIES RESERVE THE RIGHT TO REQUEST THESE IN GOOD FAITH DEPENDING ON THE SITUATION.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause explicitly waived the right to a jury trial and punitive damages. The modified clause introduces uncertainty by suggesting the waiver is negotiable, thus contradicting the initial waiver and undermining its enforceability. This conflicts with general legal principles requiring waivers to be clear and unambiguous.
perturbation.contradicted_law: 7th Amendment to the US Constitution, general contract law regarding waivers

perturbation.explanation: By changing the anti-bribery clause to a 'non-continuing basis,' limiting the knowledge requirement to 'actual' knowledge, restricting compliance to the initial agreement, and stating an intent of non-criminal action rather than an absolute warranty, and stating that improper payments will never be authorized it introduces a contradiction in terms. This weakens the overall anti-corruption warranty and potentially shields the franchisee from liability for future violations.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA), UK Bribery Act

perturbation.original_text:
14.4 Liquidated Damages on Termination.

14.4.1 Calculation of Liquidated Damages. You acknowledge and agree that the premature termination of this Agreement will cause substantial damage to us. You agree that Liquidated Damages are not a penalty, but represent a reasonable estimate of the minimum just and fair compensation for the damages we will suffer as the result of your failure to operate the Hotel for the Term. If this Agreement terminates before the Expiration Date, you will pay us Liquidated Damages as follows:

14.4.1.1 If termination occurs before you begin the Hotel Work and before the Opening Date, and you or any Guarantor (or your or any Guarantor's Affiliates) directly or indirectly, enter into a franchise, license, management, lease and/or other similar agreement for or begin construction or commence operation of a hotel, motel, inn, or similar facility at the Hotel Site under a Competitor Brand within one (1) year after termination, then you will pay us Liquidated Damages in an amount equal to $3,600 multiplied by the number of approved Guest Rooms at the Hotel.
perturbation.changed_text:
14.4 Liquidated Damages on Termination.

14.4.1 Calculation of Liquidated Damages. You acknowledge and agree that the premature termination of this Agreement will cause ABSOLUTELY ZERO damage to us. You agree that Liquidated Damages are a penalty, and DO NOT represent a reasonable estimate of the minimum just and fair compensation for the damages we will suffer as the result of your failure to operate the Hotel for the Term. If this Agreement terminates before the Expiration Date, you will pay us Liquidated Damages as follows:

14.4.1.1 If termination occurs before you begin the Hotel Work and before the Opening Date, and you or any Guarantor (or your or any Guarantor's Affiliates) directly or indirectly, enter into a franchise, license, management, lease and/or other similar agreement for or begin construction or commence operation of a hotel, motel, inn, or similar facility at the Hotel Site under a Competitor Brand within one (1) year after termination, then you will pay us Liquidated Damages IF NEGOTIATED WITH US.
perturbation.explanation: The rephrasing of the clause directly negates the purpose of liquidated damages, stating that there will be no damage. The addition of “IF NEGOTIATED WITH US” implies that the party may or may not decide to uphold that original agreement, therefore it will require an extra step outside of the bounds of the original agreement to reach an agreement on damages.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law regarding liquidated damages vs penalties
